title: *TAKE A TOUR TODAY! GREAT MOVE IN SPECIAL OF $500 MOVE IN COST! CALL!

From $1,465/mo', '* Unit 626 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 623 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 527 - Available', 'Now', 'Everything You Need, All Right Here', 'The features of this one-bedroom, one-bathroom model at The Lido include a full-size washer and dryer set and a well-equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.', 'The home also comes with a walk-in bedroom closet and hardwood floors.', 'The Lido accommodates residents 55+ and offers deluxe amenities such as a therapeutic hot tub, a social clubhouse, and a fitness center.', 'To learn more, reach out to a leasing agent today.', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT AMENITIES:', '* Air Conditioning', '* Heat', '* Ceiling Fan', '* Washer', '* Dryer', '* Refrigerator', '* Dishwasher', '* Range', '* Microwave', '* Cable', '* Carport', '* Disposal', '* Handrails', '*', 'Large Closets', '* Hardwood Flooring', '* Tile Flooring', '* Window Coverings', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES:', '* Adults 55+', '* Pool', '* Spa', '*', 'Other', '* Sundeck', '* Fitness Center', '* Free Weights', '* Clubhouse', '*', 'Rec Room', '* Business Center', '* High Speed Internet Available', '* Package Receiving', '* Short Term Lease', '* On-site Management', '* On-site Maintenance', '* Covered Parking', 'MANAGED BY:', 'ConAm Management', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x686', 'Address:', '2501 Wigwam Parkway Henderson, NV 89074', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
